Test Name: TP53 Gene Somatic Mutation Pre-Analysis Cell Sorting
Specimen Type: Fresh tissue, blood, bone marrow, and other biological fluids
Purpose: To isolate the target cell population prior to TP53 somatic mutation analysis, ensuring high accuracy in mutation detection.
Container: EDTA tube for blood and flow cytometry/sort collection tubes for sorted cells
Equipment: Flow cytometer with sorting capability (e.g., FACSAria), centrifuge, incubator, refrigerated storage
